title: Update Employee Direct Deposit Information
description: An employee needs to update their bank account information for direct deposit.

tasks.description: Identify the employee and authenticate their identity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely verifies the employee's identity.

tasks.description: Guide the employee to the self-service portal to update their direct deposit details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides instructions for the employee to make the change themselves.

tasks.description: Explain that the change may take 1-2 pay cycles to take effect and they might receive a paper check in the interim.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly sets expectations about the timing of the change.
